channel.title: Webclient Thing
channel.description: I did Ric's Webclient Tutorial.. I jarred and signed my client perfectly. (I think) and then I put the html code on my website and then it showed this.. [IMG]http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac47/tonyboloney2/helpplease.jpg[/img] [size=18pt]What's the problem? :'([/size]

item.title: Webclient Thing
item.dc:creator: @3_Days_Grace 3 Days Grace
item.description:
@3_Days_Grace wrote:

gangsta tony:

it still doesnt work?? hmm… r u sure u jarred it perfectly?

I’m pretty sure I did… I followed Ric’s Jarring and Signing Your Client video…

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Thing
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:

it still doesnt work?? hmm… r u sure u jarred it perfectly?

item.title: Webclient Thing
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You jarred your client wrong, it cant find your main class.

Read full topic
